resource.description: Register as a publisher in the CloudFormation Registry.

properties.name: AcceptTermsAndConditions
properties.description: Whether you accept the terms and conditions for publishing extensions in the CloudFormation registry. You must accept the terms and conditions in order to publish public extensions to the CloudFormation registry.
